newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Salomon cuts some drillers.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Salomon cuts some drillers.

text.p: -- Salomon Bros analyst Mark Urness has cut his ratings to buy from strong buy on Diamond Offshore Drilling Inc, Falcon Drilling Co Inc and Noble Drilling Corp to buy from strong buy.
-- He cut ENSCO International Inc, Global Marine Inc and Marine Drilling Cos Inc to hold from buy.
-- Urness said new capacity -- 24 rigs are on order -- casts a shadow over the sector and recommends investors stick to companies with deepwater exposure amd trade into other oil service stocks.
-- He said dayrates, although only 62 percent of replacement cost, were advancing to that level in some sectors.
-- "Multiples will continue to be under pressure. The group now trades at 10.6 times 1998 estimated earnings and 7.6 times cashflow at the end of 1996, while earnings have increased," Urness said.
-- The downgrades follow an announcement Friday of orders in the marine transportation industry.
